Method Detail

getMappedBondViaAtoms

public CMLBond getMappedBondViaAtoms(CMLMap map,
                                     CMLBond bond0,
                                     CMLMap.Direction toFrom)
get matched bond using atom mapping. if bond atomRefs2="a1 a2" and link to="a1" from="b1" // atomId and link to="a2" from="b2" // atomId and toFrom = Direction.FROM then will return bond atomRefs2="b1 b2" or atomRefs2="b2 b1" in bondSet1

Parameters:
map -
bond0 - bond to search with. the values in must occur in a single toFrom attribute
toFrom - specifies attribute for search atoms in atomRefs2
Returns:
mapped bond or null

getBondByAtomRefs2

public CMLBond getBondByAtomRefs2(java.lang.String atomId1,
                                  java.lang.String atomId2)
gets bond by atomRefs2.

Parameters:
atomId1 - first atomId
atomId2 - second atomId
Returns:
the bond or null
